amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Innovative Technology Guarantee program by $7 million and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the Innovative Technology Guarantee program by $7,000,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Weber (TX) amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 158 - 260 (Roll no. 251).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Weber (TX) amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 158 - 260 (Roll no. 251).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A021) offered by Mr. Weber (TX).
